[Home](../../) &gt; [@lattice/view](../) &gt; TagFactory

## TagFactory type

Tag factory - returned from el(tag) Callable with children to create RefSpec, or use .props()/.ref() to configure

Generic over: - TConfig: The renderer configuration - Tag: The element tag name (must exist in both props and elements)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TagFactory<TConfig extends AdapterConfig, Tag extends keyof TConfig['props'] & keyof TConfig['elements']> = {
    (...children: ElRefSpecChild[]): RefSpec<TConfig['elements'][Tag]>;
    props(propsOrFn: ElementProps<TConfig, Tag> | ((current: ElementProps<TConfig, Tag>) => ElementProps<TConfig, Tag>)): TagFactory<TConfig, Tag>;
    ref(...callbacks: LifecycleCallback<TConfig['elements'][Tag]>[]): TagFactory<TConfig, Tag>;
};
```
**References:** [AdapterConfig](../adapterconfig/)<!-- -->, [ElRefSpecChild](../elrefspecchild/)<!-- -->, [RefSpec](../refspec/)<!-- -->, [ElementProps](../elementprops/)<!-- -->, TagFactory<!-- -->, [LifecycleCallback](../lifecyclecallback/)

## Example


```typescript
import { createDOMView } from '@lattice/view/presets/dom';

const { el, signal, on } = createDOMView();
const count = signal(0);

// Basic usage - just children
const title = el('h1')('My App');

// With props
const button = el('button')
  .props({ disabled: false })
  ('Click me');

// With ref callbacks
const input = el('input')
  .ref((elem) => elem.focus())
  .ref(on('input', (e) => console.log(e.target.value)))
  ();
```
